Content-Length: 69741

Set-Cookie: f5avrbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb=MFEIJNJGNINMIDHJAGLEMDOHNDFPCEANOFMMEIHJJAAGGMJCOMACCIBLGACDNPFPFAGOLPEIMBGDELJDFFOHAMPODFGAJOAIMGGJOPHKHOMNKGEIKMBILADFMKDJKJFF; HttpOnly
Set-Cookie: f5_cspm=1234;

CVE-2010-1256.summary: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft IIS 6.0, 7.0, and 7.5, when Extended Protection for Authentication is enabled, allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors related to "token checking" that trigger memory corruption, aka "IIS Authentication Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

CVE-2010-2730.summary: Buffer overflow in Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.5, when FastCGI is enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted headers in a request, aka "Request Header Buffer Overflow Vulnerability."

CVE-2010-3972.summary: Heap-based buffer overflow in the TELNET_STREAM_CONTEXT::OnSendData function in ftpsvc.dll in Microsoft FTP Service 7.0 and 7.5 for Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.0, and IIS 7.5, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a crafted FTP command, aka "IIS FTP Service Heap Buffer Overrun Vulnerability." NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

CVE-2010-1899.summary: Stack consumption vulnerability in the ASP implementation in Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 5.1, 6.0, 7.0, and 7.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon outage) via a crafted request, related to asp.dll, aka "IIS Repeated Parameter Request Denial of Service Vulnerability."

CVE-2012-2531.summary: Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.5 uses weak permissions for the Operational log, which allows local users to discover credentials by reading this file, aka "Password Disclosure Vulnerability."

                <div class="col-sm-4  nomargin mayorBox" >
                    <!-- Headline and body -->        
                    <h6></h6>
                    <span >
                    <h2 class="h3" style="text-align: center;"><em><span style="font-size: 18px;">Message from MAYOR BYRNE</span><br />
</em><img alt="" style="border: 3px solid #c3d69b; width: 178px; height: 160px;" src="/img_parmaheightsoh/MAYOR%20WEB.jpg" /><br />
<span style="color: #c00000;"><span style="font-size: 18px;">Welcome to Parma Heights!</span><br />
<span style="font-size: 16px;"><a href="http://lendedu.com/blog/safest-cities-state/" target="_blank">Named One Of The <br />
100 Safest Cities In Ohio! </a><br />
</span><span style="font-size: 18px;">Buy or Rent a Home: <a href="https://www.realtor.com/realestateandhomes-search/Parma-Heights_OH" target="_blank">Realtor.com</a><br />
</span>
<br />
</span><span style="font-size: 18px;">Read my latest <em>Cityview</em> newsletter <a href="/pdf_parmaheightsoh/en-US/PH NL SPR 18 PROOF R1.pdf" target="_blank">HERE</a>.</span><br />
<br />
<span style="font-size: 16px;">Parma Heights is a community of neighborhoods with homes <br />
on quiet, tree-lined streets where people really care about one another.<br />
With programs, services and businesses for residents of all ages, <br />
Parma Heights is a great place to live, work, shop and play!<br />
<br />
Take a look at all our city has to offer by checking out our website, liking us on Facebook (City of Parma Heights) or following us on Twitter and/or Instagram (parmahts).<br />
<br />
To find homes for sale or for rent, please click on this link: <a href="http://www.realtor.com/local/Parma-Heights_OH">Realtor.com</a><br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
</span><br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
</h2>
<p> </p>

<link href="/content/datePicker.css" rel="stylesheet" media="screen" />
<link href="/content/datePickerColors.css" rel="stylesheet" media="screen" />
<script src="/scripts/jquery.mobile.custom.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/scripts/date.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/scripts/jquery.datePicker.js"></script>
<span id="dayInline" class="inlinePicker inline"></span>
<script type="text/javascript">
    //----------------------------------------------------
    // Constants
    //----------------------------------------------------
    var WEB_API_URL = "/api/items";  // decided not to do via CORS "http://localhost:64923/api/items";
    var EVENT_ITEM_TYPES = 'EVENT;EVENTREG;NEWS';//'EVENT;NEWS;EVENTREG'
    var SITE_KEY = 203;
    var LANGUAGE_CODE = 'en-US';
    var WEB_SITE_DESC = 'City of Parma Heights';
    //----------------------------------------------------

    //----------------------------------------------------
    // callback function to render days in daily calendar
    //----------------------------------------------------
    var dailyCalendarCreateDayCells = function ($td, thisDate, month, year) {
        if (!$td.hasClass("other-month")) {
            $td.attr("id", "DayCalCell" + thisDate.getDate());
        }
    }
    //----------------------------------------------------

    //----------------------------------------------------
    //callback for when daily calendar month changed
    //----------------------------------------------------
    var dailyCalendarEventsForMonth;
    var dailyCalendarDisplayedMonthStartDate;
    var dailyCalendarDisplayedMonthEndDate;
    function dailyCalendarMonthChanged(displayedMonth, displayedYear) {
        dailyCalendarDisplayedMonthStartDate = (displayedMonth + 1) + '/1/' + displayedYear;
        if (displayedMonth == 11) {
            displayedMonth = 0;
            displayedYear++;
        }
        else {
            displayedMonth++;
        }
        dailyCalendarDisplayedMonthEndDate = dateToShortString(new Date((displayedMonth + 1) + '/1/' + displayedYear).addDays(-1));
        //ajax call to get a month of data
        $.getJSON(WEB_API_URL + '/GetItemsByType',
            { itemTypeCode: EVENT_ITEM_TYPES, languageCd: LANGUAGE_CODE, siteKey: SITE_KEY, returnEventsAfterDate: dailyCalendarDisplayedMonthStartDate, returnEventsBeforeDate: dailyCalendarDisplayedMonthEndDate },
            //success callback
            function (data) {
                //set variable for month of data
                dailyCalendarEventsForMonth = data;
                //iterate the events changing color of the days with events
                $.each(data, function (key, val) {
                    //get the event start day
                    var startDate = new Date(val.StartDate);
                    var eventStartDay = startDate.getDate();
                    //highlight days with events
                    if (!$("#DayCalCell" + eventStartDay).hasClass("hasEvent")) {
                        $("#DayCalCell" + eventStartDay).addClass("hasEvent");
                    }
                });
            });
    }
    //----------------------------------------------------

    //----------------------------------------------------
    // initialize controls
    //----------------------------------------------------
    $(document).ready(function () {
        //display dates in the list tab
        $('#dayInline')
            .datePicker({ inline: true, startDate: '01/01/1996', renderCallback: dailyCalendarCreateDayCells })
            .bind(
                'dateSelected',
                function (e, selectedDate, $td) {
                    //var startDate = new Date(selectedDate);
                    //var endDate = addDays(startDate, 1);
                    //if (dailyCalendarEventsForMonth) {
                    //    addEventsToDiv(dateToShortString(selectedDate), dateToShortString(endDate), 'listDayEvents', dailyCalendarEventsForMonth);
                    //}
                    //alert('/en-us/Event-calendar.aspx?Date='+dateToShortStringDelimiter(selectedDate, '%2F') );
                    window.location.href = '/en-us/Event-calendar.aspx?Date='+dateToShortStringDelimiter(selectedDate, '%2F');

                }
            )
            .bind(
                'dpMonthChanged',
                function (e, displayedMonth, displayedYear) {
                    dailyCalendarMonthChanged(displayedMonth, displayedYear);
                });
        //Get events for today
        var startDate = new Date();
        var endDate = addDays(startDate, 1);
        //mark days on daily calendar with events
        dailyCalendarMonthChanged(startDate.getMonth(), startDate.getFullYear());
    });
    //----------------------------------------------------
</script>
            <p class="smallCaps text-center">

    <script>
        if (navigator.userAgent.match(/IEMobile\/10\.0/)) {
            var msViewportStyle = document.createElement("style");
            msViewportStyle.appendChild(
                document.createTextNode(
                    "@-ms-viewport{width:auto!important}"
                )
            );
            document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].
                appendChild(msViewportStyle);
        }


        $(document).ready(function () {
            //enable mobile gestures on bootstrap carousels
            $(".carousel").swiperight(function () {
                $(this).carousel('prev');
            });
            $(".carousel").swipeleft(function () {
                $(this).carousel('next');
            });

            $(".dropdownNavNewWindow").change(function () {
                if ($(this).val() != '') {
                    window.open($(this).val(), "_blank");
                }
            });
            $(".dropdownNav").change(function () {
                if ($(this).val() != '') {
                    window.location.href = $(this).val();
                }
            });

        });
        $(function () {
            $('.carousel').carousel({
                interval: 5000
            });
        });
    </script>

    <script>
        $(function () {
            console.log("ready!");
            var myTempPath = $(location).attr('pathname')
            var myPath = myTempPath.replace(/\//g, '');
            myPath = myPath.replace('en-US', '');
            // alert(myPath);

            if ((myPath == 'default.aspx') || (myPath == '') || (myPath == 'home.aspx') || (myPath == 'Home.aspx') || (myPath == 'Default.aspx')) {
                $("#BootstrapMenuNav_divNavBar").hide();
                $("#breadCrumbs").hide();
            } else {
                $("#BootstrapMenuNav_divNavBar").show();
                $("#breadCrumbs").show();
            }


        });
  </script>
